name: addy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an address, usually an email address: I didn't get that file. Can you check my addy and resend? Email me at my profile addy and we'll sort out the details.
More examplesFewer examplesI want to send you an email. Is profile addy ok?Shall I email you my physical addy?I stupidly sent the email to your profile addy and not the other one.Can anyone whose current email addy I don't have please email or pm me.
